title: Smoke and Mirrors
description: In this Dateline classic, when a Chicago pharmaceutical representative stops returning calls, her large and loving family begin to worry. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 18, 2016.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
